content.html: Here's the thing - I've a degree in CompSci and have spent my professional life working with all manner of high tech kit. I find the whole crypto space baffling. There is nothing that I've found which is even close to mainstream acceptability. And most of the back end is ðŸ”¥
content.value:
Here's the thing - I've a degree in CompSci and have spent my professional life working with all manner of high tech kit.
I find the whole crypto space baffling.
There is nothing that I've found which is even close to mainstream acceptability.
And most of the back end is ðŸ”¥
